adHeader: Concrete/Cement/Sidewalk - Crack & Lippage Repair - Drainage Channels
adDetails: Did you get a letter from the city stating "Notice To Repair Sidewalk"? Did you find white spots spray painted on your sidewalk with your notice? I have a tool with a "V'" shaped diamond cutting wheel, called a "crack chaser" that i can run down any cracks in your sidewalk. This tool creates a clean "V" shaped slot that i will then fill with fast drying cement for a very reasonable price. This tool can also be used to create channels to "direct" water drainage. I also have a diamond grinder that can be used to bevel, level, flatten and/or smooth down any lippage or trip hazards. No permit from the city is necessary for these types of repair. No slab removal and/or replacement offered. You need a permit for this type of work and i would prefer not to have to deal with the city. I am interested in small jobs only! References and examples of past jobs available. Pay me AFTER completion to your satisfaction! 29 years stone experience. I also have the ability to cut, drill and polish concrete, marble and granite. Please include your phone number in your response. Send a picture if you can.
